author: Special Correspondent
text: The Municipal Council meeting held here recently witnessed a clash between the ruling All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (AIADMK) and the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam (DMK) councillors over the issue of hiking the monthly rent for the shops owned by the municipality. The DMK councillors staged a walkout from the meeting protesting against the hike, which they alleged was too steep.
title: DMK councillors stage walkout
